summary: This document is a chain of email correspondence between prosecutors and defense attorneys regarding the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The emails discuss scheduling meetings, requesting financial account documents, and arranging for a trial witness from JPMorgan.

persons.name: Allison Stoddart
persons.context: Attorney from WilmerHale representing or involved in the defense for Ghislaine Maxwell, coordinating meetings and document requests with prosecutors.

events.title: Jury Selection for Maxwell Trial
events.description: Mentioned as occurring during the week of November 15, 2021, affecting scheduling availability.

events.title: Request for Trial Witness Subpoena
events.description: Defense requests a trial appearance subpoena for a JPMorgan witness.

events.title: Request for Account Documents

keyFacts: Prosecutors are requesting account ownership documents for a specific financial account (O78859008) in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
The defense team from WilmerHale is coordinating with prosecutors to arrange for a trial witness from JPMorgan.
Jury selection was underway in November 2021, creating scheduling difficulties for meetings between legal teams.
The correspondence shows ongoing pretrial preparation and evidence gathering between prosecution and defense attorneys.
